TransactionStateContext.DepositState: Occurs when users send Ether to the contract, triggering the Deposit function.
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawalState: Occurs when tokens or Ether are withdrawn via WitdrawTokenToHolder or WithdrawToHolder functions.

ExternalInteractions.TokenTransfer: The contract makes external token transfer calls, such as transferring tokens from the contract to a user.
ExternalInteractions.EtherTransfer: Direct Ether transfers are made to user addresses.
